attributes.action: Screening for everyone every few years to check for any signs of cancer.
attributes.additional_details: Cancer is the most terrifying disease and I want us to be able to have more of a chance to fight it and more of a chance of catching it early in the not so easily diagnosed areas of the body.
attributes.background: I would like there to be an option for us all to be screened every few years to check for any signs of cancer. I know we do this for certain parts of the body but it needs to be more.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We understand you'd like to see people without symptoms of cancer offered regular tests, but we're not sure what specific tests you'd like to see introduced.
